channel.title: Self-driving car on Logotyp.us
channel.description: Recent content in Self-driving car on Logotyp.us

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Argo Logo
Argo AI is an autonomous driving technology company headquartered in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania. The company was co-founded in 2016 by Bryan Salesky and Peter Rander, veterans of the Google and Uber automated driving programs. Argo AI is an independent company that builds the software, hardware, maps, and cloud-support infrastructure to power self-driving vehicles. Argo has two major investors: Ford Motor Co. and the Volkswagen Group. Argo’s Self Driving System technology will be incorporated into vehicles manufactured by the auto-makers through these partnerships.
You can download theArgologo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Argo
item.description: Argo AI is an autonomous driving technology company headquartered in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania. The company was co-founded in 2016 by Bryan Salesky and Peter Rander, veterans of the Google and Uber automated driving programs. Argo AI is an independent company that builds the software, hardware, maps, and cloud-support infrastructure to power self-driving vehicles. Argo has two major investors: Ford Motor Co. and the Volkswagen Group. Argo’s Self Driving System technology will be incorporated into vehicles manufactured by the auto-makers through these partnerships.
